name: Merfolk Salvager
proficiencies: Saving Throw: DEX +4 | Skill: Athletics +3 | Skill: Perception +2

special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
special_abilities.desc: The salvager can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The salvager makes two attacks with its coral rapier.

actions.name: Coral RapierMelee Attack:
actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Inject Toxin (2/Day)Melee Attack:
actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
